title: Free Dances Animations Pack
description: A free pack that contains more than 18 types of dances
longDescription:
Free download on our WebSite : https://terribilisstudio.fr/?section=MD

Preview video

A pack that contains more than 18 types of dances (source : mixamo.com).

These animations have been categorized and associated in order to increase the realism.

The animations were rebuilt on the skeleton unreal engine.

Type of dance:

Simple

shuffle

Hip Hop

Robotic

Saloon

Rumba

Break dance

YMCA

Twist

Oriental

Salsa

Sexy

Twerk

Macarena

House

Swing

Samba

Gangnam Style

Very simple to use (watch video)
technicalDetails:
Preview video

  • All Mixamo dances (~180 animations).
  • Renaming of the bones to make them match the UE4 skeleton’s
  • Deleting of the bones which did not match anything (fingertips, toes, head).
  • Modification of the RootMotion to the UE4 standard (the mixamo handles it weirdly).
  • New structure of the animation graph (More pleasant visually, less greedy (with an enumeration).
  • 28 Dance Styles.
  • Simplicity of use.
  • Collision between the characters (With the blueprint character).
  • Breakdance edition with several settings / configurations with different Montages.
  • No cut between animations (blend).
  • Possibility of 'Retarget' with V or T pose (both are available in the pack).
  • Project size: 89 mo.

Mixamo converter

Download the Mixamo converter to convert more mixamo's animations in ue4.

KNOWN ISSUES

Currently only grounded animations have adequate root motion. (Jumping/climbing/parkour animations will need some more work.)

SUPPORT

Consult our documentation or website
